item.title: Gartner Layoff Buzz Gains Steam Online Weeks After Earnings-Induced Stock Slump
item.description: Gartner stock has lost about 51% year-to-date, although the Koyfin-compiled analysts’ consensus price target of $304.78 implies nearly 30% upside pote...

item.title: Why Is State Street Stock Gaining In Premarket Trading?
item.description: Citi sees an "attractive opportunity" in State Street to drive organic fee growth while maintaining expense discipline.

item.title: Oil Prices On Track For Weekly Loss As Oversupply Concerns Mount
item.description: Benchmark Brent crude prices fell 0.5% to $66.68 per barrel, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate prices fell 0.5% to $63.15 per barrel at 4.18 a.m. ET.

item.title: GST Cut, Festive Demand Could Power 20% Upside In Bajaj Finance: SEBI RA Finkhoz RoboAdvisory
item.description: The analyst sees crucial support near ₹845.
